mathakadi shri lanka maha bankuwa wisin naya pilibandawa warthawak elidakwala thibenawa. 2017 maha banku warthawa anuwa ape rate naya pramanaya rupiyal biliyana 10,313yi.

adala naduwa sambandhayen adhikaranaya hamuwe mita pera sakshi labadun wanajiwi departhamenthuwe basnahira palatha bhara adhyaksha upul indrajith adhikaranaya hamuwe kiya thibune dhammaloka himiyan santhakaye sitiyadi wanajiwi departhamenthuwa bharayata gath ali patawata nithyanukula balapathrayak nothibu bawaya. 2015 wasare janawari 28 weni dina ho eeta aasanna dinayaka narahenpita alan mathiniyarama wiharasthanaya thula balapathrayak nomathiwa ali pataweku santhakaye thabaganima sambandhayen nithipathiwaraya wisin unwahanseta erehiwa podu depala panatha yatathe nadu pawaranu laba thibe.
